title: Your Favorite Food
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>Karin-chaaan, the bread is ready. Can you take it to the table?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Okay. Butter and honey for yours, right, Emma?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yeah. Here you go, scrambled eggs, sausages, and vegetable soup. Let’s dig in♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Alright, thanks for the food.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Thanks for the food~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Hey, Emma, would you like the crust from mine?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Eeeh!? You’re giving them to me again today!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Yeah. Here, go ahead.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Thank you~! Hnn, buono!! I love bread crust~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, you can eat them all, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
